### <a href="/documentation/swiftui/datepickerstyleconfiguration/$selection#Selecting-the-date" class="header-anchor" data-v-5e9b845c="" data-after-text="in page link">Selecting the date<img src="data:image/svg+xml;base64," class="svg-icon link-icon icon" /></a>

</div>

<div class="section-content" v-6420792f="">

<div class="link-block topic" v-88575ff8="" v-bbeda56a="" v-6420792f="">

<a href="/documentation/swiftui/datepickerstyleconfiguration/selection" class="link has-adjacent-elements" data-v-88575ff8=""><span class="decorator" data-v-2883a6a9=""><code class="decorated-title" data-v-2883a6a9="" data-v-88575ff8="">var</code></span><span class="decorator empty-token" data-v-2883a6a9=""><code class="decorated-title" data-v-2883a6a9="" data-v-88575ff8=""> </code></span><span class="identifier" data-v-2883a6a9=""><code class="decorated-title" data-v-2883a6a9="" data-v-88575ff8="">selection</code></span><span class="decorator" data-v-2883a6a9=""><code class="decorated-title" data-v-2883a6a9="" data-v-88575ff8="">: </code></span><span class="decorator" data-v-2883a6a9=""><code class="decorated-title" data-v-2883a6a9="" data-v-88575ff8="">Date</code></span></a>

<div class="abstract" v-88575ff8="">

<div class="content" v-15d7e6ba="" v-88575ff8="">

The date value being displayed and selected.

</div>
